definition: general congress/meeting of the whole committee
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The plenary assembly official election supposes scrutineer 36.
sentences.chinese: 大会全体会议正式选举设监票人36名。

sentences.english: We should recommit this important problem to the whole meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该重新把这个重大问题提交全体会议加以讨论。

sentences.english: Accordingly, the General Committee will be held outside the plenary sessions, focused action to consider approval of the motion.
sentences.chinese: 据此，外通委将召开全体会议，集中审议批准动议案。

sentences.english: The current UN General Assembly President Deiss chaired the plenary session that day.
sentences.chinese: 本届联大主席戴斯主持了当天的全体会议。

sentences.english: In-person meetings for code review were not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 代码评审的全体会议是不支持的。

sentences.english: The local Party committees at all levels meet in plenary session at least twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 党的地方各级委员会全体会议，每年至少召开两次。

sentences.english: The plenary usually accepts the vote of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 全体会议通常采纳该委员会的投票结果。

sentences.english: Japanese governors-elect join the singing during the third plenary session.
sentences.chinese: 在第三次全体会议当中日本的社长当选人们加入歌唱。

sentences.english: Following the ceremony was the plenary meeting.
sentences.chinese: 开幕式结束后即转入全体会议。

sentences.english: Liu Qian, vice minister spoke at the plenary session.
sentences.chinese: 刘谦副部长在全体会议上发言。

sentences.english: The Director-General and Member States also address the delegates at the plenary.
sentences.chinese: 总干事和会员国还在全体会议上发表讲话。

definition: abbr. for 全國人大會議|全国人大会议[Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4], National People's Congress (NPC)

pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 Da4 hui4 yi4

definition: to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
national general congress/Communist party national congress, in recent times every five years
pinyin: quan2 guo2 dai4 biao3 da4 hui4

definition: standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)
the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
party congress (of the Communist Party of China)
(Chinese) National People's Congress/abbr. to 人大[Ren2 da4]
pinyin: Quan2 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dai4 biao3 Da4 hui4
